pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detect Sensitive Points in the Tail // The goal of 'TailID' is to detect sensitive points in the tail of a dataset using techniques from Extreme Value Theory (EVT). It utilizes the Generalized Pareto Distribution (GPD) for assessing tail behavior and detecting inconsistent points with the Identical Distribution hypothesis of the tail. For more details see Manau (2025)doi:10.4230/LIPIcs.ECRTS.2025.20.
